parameters: There's a little trash in here.
Cleanest stove I've been in front of in a while.
Let's see what we have to work with.
Oh. I was going to make you something.
Please let me. It's the least I can do.
How do you like your eggs? Does pancakes sound good?
I'm usually more of a cereal guy.
Well, I do. Where's your flour?
\.\.After how many years does flour expire?
When you said to get "the basics," I didn't really know what you meant.
You did a good job! I just meant the stuff any kitchen ought to have.
I just eat the same things daily. Deciding what to eat three times a day is a hassle.
Mostly prepackaged food. The less preparation beforehand, the fewer dishes after, the better.
Those sentences you just said are insane to me, but okay.
Everything I touch turns to a burnt crisp or \.\.expires.
Well, while I’m here, I will feed us. Okay?
Hmm. My phone is charged enough, but I'm not getting any bars.
That's unfortunate. I think I mentioned to you that reception is spotty.
I think there’s something wrong with the router.
Frankly, I use the computer so much at work, I haven’t bothered to get it fixed here.
Oh! Well, I used to do internet provider stuff at my old job.
I might know something. Mind if I take a look?
\|That would be fine. It's in the garage.
Maybe we can watch more documentaries later.
Well, barely. It's a little past noon.
You slept for \.\.fourteen hours. \.How are you?
And I got you a compatible phone charger as well.
Okay. Give me one minute. Then I'll make us breakfast.
I should get up and get myself together.
It's charging now. The battery's so low, the screen won't turn on.
I'm REALLY hungry. Let's see what's in the fridge.
This probably leads to the garage.
No reason to go back out to the garage right now.
He wasn't expecting company, yet there's zero dishes in the sink. Couldn't be me.
These knives look decent. I'd like to try them out.
These knives are decent. Could use a sharpening, though.
I don't wanna be rude and barge upstairs.
I don't wanna be rude and barge upstairs.
Toaster and dishwasher, both stainless steel.
Nah. Sorry. I dunno whatever's going on with that.
My boss is gonna be so mad I didn't call out.
But I do feel a lot better having slept and ate.
I was really running on empty.
I'm relieved you didn't. Thank you for coming with me.
\|You can, but... \|I should have mentioned this last night.
I've got a bit of taxidermy up there.
Is that what you've been all tense about? It's fine.
I wanna see your bedroom. Lemme go look.
Blue leather couch. It's nice and big.
